title: Caught Offside: EPL Preview Part 1 - Ten Big Questions
description:
In part 1 of our EPL season preview, we dive into some of the season's big questions such as which manager enters on the hottest seat, which player we're most excited for, which transfer we're feeling best about and much much more! And don't forget to start sending your Premier League questions and comments to @COSoccerpod on Twitter, CaughtOffsidePod@gmail.com or @CaughtOffsideESPN on Instagram for our mailbag special in Thursday's part 2.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: We begin our deep dive into the 2022-23 English Premier League season
